Rep.ReportSql: select g.ReceiptId, g.SerialNumbers, g.SkuCode, i.ItemCode, g.State, g.ItemName, g.Quantity, g.CheckQuantity, s.SupplierName, s.Mobile, g.TempLocation as Location, t.Quantity as SJQuantity from goodsreceiptline g join item i on i.ItemId = g.ItemId join supplier s on s.SupplierId = i.SupplierId join stock t on t.SkuCode = g.SkuCode where @Param1
Rep.TotalSql: select count(0) from goodsreceiptline g join item i on i.ItemId = g.ItemId join supplier s on s.SupplierId = i.SupplierId join stock t on t.SkuCode = g.SkuCode where @Param1

Dynamic.c: g.WmsId=(select WhsId from warehouse where WhsCode=@WhsCode)
